getVersion

Overview

This call is used to get the current version and build date of the app.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
     

Request

  • The headers must include a valid authentication token.
Parameter Description Required
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
op Operation Yes
Test URL MSG Agent -MSGSIT:
http://msgsit.rpdata.com/ttsvr/msgdebug?uid=TWISTUSER001&op=getVersion

Response

Success: { "response": { "status": "success", "result": { "version": "3.12", "buildDate": "07-09-2015", "buildNo": "5" } } }

Error: { "response": { "status": "error", "description": "error description" } }
